Jeremy Kyle was forced to apologise to viewers of his ITV show eating their breakfast today, as one guest made a vulgar comment about another’s boyfriend's penis. 
Chelsea had been brought on the show by her sister Bethany, being accused of cheating with her boyfriend Josh. 
Chelsea denied she’d done anything with Josh, and that he’d just come in to her bedroom and shown her his “one-inch wonder” penis. 
But Josh told a different story, and even added: “She’s got to wipe Anthony's penis with a baby wipe before they even start!" Read More Chelsea was accused of wiping her boyfriend's penis with a baby wipe before sex (Photo: ITV) Jeremy Kyle had to apologise for the vulgar comments (Photo: ITV) It was awkward... (Photo: ITV) 
Jeremy was absolutely flabbergasted at the revelation, and he immediately apologised to viewers. 
He said: “I apologise if you’re just waking up and tucking into your breakfast.” 
Anthony, Bethany, Josh and Chelsea all did lie detector tests to prove they hadn’t cheated. 
But it was just Chelsea’s boyfriend Anthony who passed with flying colours. Read More Jeremy was close to giving up (Photo: ITV) Bethany failed the lie detector test (Photo: ITV) Chelsea also failed (Photo: ITV) 
Bethany admitted to sleeping with three people behind her boyfriend Josh’s back. 
But then the lie detector revealed she’d actually cheated on him with even more people. 
And the lie detector confirmed her boyfriend Josh had also cheated on her with more people than just her sister.
